resources.string: Could not download data. Would you like to try again?

This app gets the appropriate categories from the api and stores them in an SQLite database.

That's actually happening now, as you read this text!
Selecting a category will display the items of that category in what I refer to throughout the code as a Catalogue.

Selecting an item will open up the detail view that includes a ViewPager of the product images and more details.

What I didn't complete.

Add item to wishlist
Highlight items saved to watchlist in the category view
My own implementation of an image cache/ loading system (Ran out of time!)
General bits of finesse (transition animations, smoother experience loading category view etc)

I hope you like it!
